name: Luz
text: Blaze was pretty great! It was a Subway or Coldstone type experience and was fun to choose my toppings at the bar this way. The quick fire over had our pizza and Dough knots done quickly! Delicious! Definitely would suggest the pesto dough knots!

name: Joan Harrigan
text: Blaze Pizza is by far the best!  My daughter/granddaughter took me there for my birthday since they know it's my favorite.  I ordered a meat lovers, and could add anything I wanted for no additional charge!  I added veggies, and made it a Supreme!!  It was delicious!  Can't wait to go there again!  Always fast service with a smile!

name: FLOREDA PRIMROSE
text: U can build ur own pizza.. which is the best and the cookies are a must to have..and it's all not expensive.. the ambience is good.. and the people are so friendly

name: evany valenzuela
text: So many different combinations to choose from. The crust is delish and the size is a perfect amount for one person. The prices are an awesome deal and they do offer lunch specials.

name: miroken le
text: we came down to try the $4 special. it was a pretty good deal and the build your own pie was outstanding! give it a try!

name: Jorge Rodriguez
text: The pizza can be made to order if you select the Build Your Own Pizza! I selected the Meat Pizza and they still allow you to add extra ingredients without charging an arm and leg! The crust on the Pizzas is awesome.... Crispy! The prices ‚Ä¶More

name: Angelica Jacobs
text: Their pizzas were super yummy! And the fact that you can get as many toppings as you want for the same price is absolutely amazing! I tried the garlic white sauce, ricotta, sausage, applewood smoked bacon, pesto drizzle before and after cooking, and arugula on top after cooking ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS!!!!

name: Kirstin Kiracofe
text: Great customer service, lots of topping choices and they even have a $5 Monday special. The pizza is SO good! I like the fountain drink selection.

name: Curtis Hasse
text: Great food and service! The Blood Orange Lemonade is wonderful!

name: felipe guilfu
text: This place was amazing. The people were very friendly. When I asked for vegan cheese, they asked me if they needed to change their gloves. Never in my life has that ever happened. They have good vegan options and good drink options as well. Very cool place.

name: Annette Chavez
text: This is a tasty well made thin crust pizza.  It was reasonable because we had a coupon.  The people working there did their best to give good service. Thank you,  Blaze. It is well named because the pizzas come out fast because thin crust.

name: Victoria Vasquez
text: My first time going there and they were very friendly and patient in showing me how things worked there. The pizza was also very good. I'd go again.

name: Christina Gilliam
text: Blaze Pizza is always EXCELLENT!! FANTASTIC service,  delicious toppings,  and their drinks are the best!! Manager Merrisa really hooked us up and we had the best food!! Definitely our favorite!

name: Armando Burruel
text: I was pleasantly surprised with how good this pizza was or is. Another thing that really surprised me what's how quick the pizza was made. I like how they make it in front of you and you get to make it your own. The prices are on point and ‚Ä¶More

name: Nellinda M
text: Lets take a moment to talk about Blaze Pizza ... As we know there is a place a few streets down that offers fresh personal size pizzas as well . I have visited both locations and I have to say Blaze is my favorite.  The crust is better ‚Ä¶More

name: Julian Gonzalez
text: Delicious custom pizza.

name: Matthew Knatz
text: Typical fast fire pizza joint. They all kinda run together, so here's are the highlights: Crust is thin and crispy and toppings are what you'd expect. Good for crowds (everybody gets what they want and you're not stuck trying to figure out ‚Ä¶More

name: Patti Fitzsimmons
text: I always enjoy their pizzas, wonderful variety of ingredients and great service. They have a nice selection of non-alcoholic beverages. Last time I was there, they didn't have any straws but had large open mouth drink lids that ended up being a mess in the car.

name: JEFF Devlieger
text: 1 topping or 20 all one price. They will put as much or lil as you want on it. Staff is always very friendly. If you like thin crust pizza you will love. They have a thicker crust, as well as a cauliflower crust and 1 or 2 others.plus large ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Jimenez
text: Very good pizza! Better than all the other pizza chains in town. The crust was a bit on the burnt side and that's why it lost a star. Other than that, excellent pizza! Please open up a Blaze on the northwest side of Tucson!

name: Elizabeth Lee
text: Previously visited this Blaze on another visit and received faster service.  On this visit, the service was slower due to pizza machine not working properly and looked like they were short staffed. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Rice
text: So good! Stop thinking about it and go eat!. Food is delicious, reasonably priced and mostly healthy.

name: Rawan Rambo
text: Great pizza and great selection of different types of toppings. Download their App and collect points for rewards. One pizza is enough for one person. Just delicious.

name: Joey Mascare√±as
text: Went there for the keto pizza, and it was great. Employees were very informative and helpful. And it's not too expensive, it was also pretty fast. Would definitely recommend.

name: AC Mendoza
text: This place was awesome. Build your own pizza, nice! If not, choose one from the menu. They also have fresh salads. Gluten free too! The pizza was only 8.99. Nice size. Great price. Hell yeah I'm going back! Blaze On!

name: OtterPop MUA
text: So I ordered my pizza for pickup through the app, and I placed the order to be ready at 12:20 pm, I got there at 1:00 pm. (Granted I know I was the late one..) but my pizza wasn‚Äôt under a hot lamp or anything to keep it warm, so when I got ‚Ä¶More

name: Angie Papple Johnston
text: This place is awesome. The ingredients are always fresh, they make the pizza right in front of you, and it's not all that bad for you, as far as pizza goes. ‚Ä¶More

name: John Richardson
text: Great pizza Great Staff

name: Adam Williams
text: Absolutely loved it! Employees were awesome and the Pizza was amazing.

name: Sarah Coughlin
text: The pizza is always fantastic! Staff is helpful and knowledgable about what they sell. I'll definitely be back!

name: Randy Valenzuela
text: Pretty good pizza. I prefer to start with the white top and add my favorites. Similar to Mod Pizza. They do have new agu frescas but their mango and strawberry flavors need a little work. Nice personnel with smiles. Clean eating areas.

name: Mark Avery
text: Blaze Pizza!!! What more can you say about the best place to get pizza in Tucson. Friendly, inviting staff, kid friendly and a warm atmosphere always. Thanks Blaze for never disappointing.  üòÅ

name: Alison Koleski
text: The whole staff was so hard working and gracious during a hectic dinner rush. I greatly admire their dedication to great service as they offered free drinks and desserts to compensate for any delay. The pizza was so delicious it was well worth the very reasonable wait! Thank you Blaze team!

name: April C
text: Yum! Yum! Yum! Fast friendly service, Fresh ingredients. Loved the cauliflower crust.

name: michael behm
text: Staff was extremely friendly and courteous the minute we walked in the door. Even though we had never been here before, they explained everything and helped us from beginning to end.  There were several options for everything from crust to sauce and toppings. If you can't find something here till like it's your own fault.

name: D Michelle Jones
text: Always delicious. Great staff. Very clean. Options for crust like keto.

name: Jack Baty
text: Fun pizza place with gluten-free and low-carb options.  Nice atmosphere with helpful counter people.

name: Kelly Breeden
text: The best pizza. the only pizza i eat. Love the idea of making your own with what you want. I've been there quite a few times and have never had a bab pizza yet.  And the staff is great . always making sure you have what you want.  And I like it when it has  little charred on the crust. Love love this place

name: Kerry Gonzales
text: Really loved their pizza. But this location is closed permanently. I‚Äôm very sad.

name: Gina
text: My fav go to for pizza. Besides having so many great options for toppings you truly get to customize and it's ready quick. The people who work there are all super nice and it's obvious their main goal is for you to enjoy yourself.

name: Kim
text: Great, fresh, amd authentic pizza! You can build your own or pick one they have. They all taste awesome!

name: Howard Rains
text: I had a gluten free crust and it was quite tasty. The service was top notch. My wife enjoyed her pizza as well. All of their ingredients looked fresh and appetizing. I recommend Blaze and will good back.

name: C. P.
text: The service was friendly and fast. The pizza was pretty good. The crust was crisp and chewy but had too much flour on it. I realize some flour is necessary to keep the crust from sticking to the boards they cook on but it was just too much. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kate Lee
text: First time I went here was awesome so I was excited to come again. Both times I ordered Red Vine pizza. The second visit though they put tons of sauce, but barely any basil, cheese, or tomatoes. It was like biting into sauce. Asked them to ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Matter
text: Build your own pizza br far the best , the toppings they have are amazingly  delicious.

name: Roberta Sanchez
text: I loved the atmosphere staff was great and so was the food so sad it is closed now‚òπÔ∏è

name: Lynn Holabird
text: Well done pizza, clean restaurant atmosphere. It's a bit too fast food though. I enjoy pizza that looks handmade and not uniform.

name: Chance
text: Really good pizza when they were open but it appears to be permanently closed without warning.

name: Nick Garrett
text: Pizza was delicious and employees were patient with us ordering from there for the first time.

name: Peggy Salvail
text: No stars, worst keto pizza,I have ever had.  Prices to high for the small size, taste like cardboard and they were afraid to put sauce on them.  Also my husband is Vegiterian because if meat allergies and when he asked them to be careful ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Leedy
text: Never a bad experience. The craft sodas make it worth a trip. Lebanon made a great investment.

name: Debra Ellis
text: This place is great and a great value.  The pizzas run $8.99 I believe plus tax.  Pizza dough is handmade and they have a press that automatically shapes the pizza.  They have thick, thin and gluten free crust.  They have pesto sauce, ‚Ä¶More

name: Amanda
text: Get a build your own and watch your kids be delighted. They call it an individual pizza but with as many toppings as we put on them, we can easily share and still get full. Great selection of craft soda and real lemonade.

name: Gianluigi Martini
text: Amazing food and great staff

name: Julie Perez
text: Loved the Keto crust. And the service was exceptional.

name: LF LPZ
text: It is absolutely yummy and the staff is always willing to help and make your pizza even better! We tried it for the first time or earlier this week and went back today.

name: Bill Chenoweth
text: Another great, fast, friendly, and inexpensive pizza joint here in Tucson. First time at Blaze Pizza for me and I'll definitely be back. The lady who built my pizza was very friendly. This place is very similar to MOD Pizza, and that's a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jerry Gilbert
text: I have been here a couple of times with my daughters for dinner and lunch.  If you are not familiar with their ordering style you might get confused.  You order a base pizza (they have several listed) and then you can add on additional ‚Ä¶More

name: Brianna Kernag
text: I loved the pizza and drink that I got there. It tasted great. My family loves it there and I will be sure to go back with them very soon.

name: Christine Schluter
text: Love this place great food at a good price couldn't ask for more.

name: Sandra Lanpher
text: I got a salad. It was delish! I love picking out what I want instead of being limited to a few choices. My friends got pizza and they said it was a hit.

name: Shelanda N
text:
Blaze On‚ù§Ô∏è
I had an amazing Pizza and a Caesar Salad.
The Blaze Team was very helpful in explaining the ordering process as I was new to the Blaze experience. I'm hoping that there is plans to build one on the Southwest side.

name: Nathan N
text: A buddy brought me here. Now I bring my buddies here. Better than Mod Pizza any day.

name: Tom Garretson
text: First time visit, and the staff was very friendly and informative in regards to the order process. The build it in front of you process is fun to watch! From pressing the dough to putting the finishing touches on at the end!  Also it was a very clean and well presented store. I will definitely be back!

name: Joseph Gregory
text: they put plenty on my pizza. I didn‚Äôt have to keep asking them to put more cheese etc. tasted awesome with a thin crust and a bit of grilled flavor.

name: Richard Huerta
text: Not a great spot for a quick lunch! Very long wait for pizza and they do not allow order ahead.  They do have an app but that also doesn't work very well!! Food was good that is the only reason I gave 2 stars, as it's really nothing special ‚Ä¶More

name: Joey Woolen II
text: Burnt food.. No paper to wipe ur hands.. Really bad service!! üò°üò° pre Marissa Eddie.. She always blames it on her being bipolar.. Lol.. What a joke.  I have friends with bipolar and don't act like that.

name: Michael Foltz
text: Surprisingly good. I never expected this gem. The pizza is great and you build it like a burrito at Chipotle's. Fast delicious and good beer on tap. I will make this a regular stop

name: Hannah Taylor
text: I always love this place and it's wonderful pizza and gluten free crust. I recommend for anyone who us gluten free and wants fast pizza. It is quite a bit cheaper, and much better than anywhere else.

name: Kerrie Durazo
text: Great new pizza place in Tucson. The service was fantastic and the pizza was delicious!!  The staff was very friendly and helpful. The kids had a blast building their own pizza. Very kid friendly for my finicky eater. It's a must try!!

name: Brittany Knight
text: My new favorite pizza place! Delicious.

name: Rosel Bantugan
text: Fresh as you can get. Fired pizza and you get to choose your sauce and toppings, fair price. Nice, clean place. They serve artisan thin crust but you can choose a high rise thick crust too. We will be back.

name: stephen mcgirr
text: By far my favorite pizza place ever. I am passionate about pizza and make it a point to try a slice wherever I go. Blaze is hands down the best. The whole experience is amazing. They have a great selection of toppings, excellent variety in ‚Ä¶More

name: Denise Woods
text: Excellent pizza. Very fresh ingredients. I always enjoy Blaze Pizza and have leftovers for the next day.

name: Roman Intrieri
text: Alexis was super friendly and polite! I will be returning because of her :) great pizza too!

name: Nancy B.
text: I love, Love, LOVE BLAZE PIZZA.  You are able to make it "Your Way".  Blaze is the first pizza I have gone back to a 2nd time after moving from Chicago 10 years ago.  I NOW visit BLAZE several times a month.  LEFT-OVERS are great for ‚Ä¶More

name: Kat77rose
text: One of the workers was SUPER NICE! Even waved at me as i left! The food was good too. But the food almost felt like a bonus just to interact with the waitress.

name: Michael Cornfield
text: Only day to eat there is on Mondays with their special.  Otherwise, too expensive for what you get.  Right down the street is MOD Pizza, where you have unlimited toppings for less money, a friendlier staff and similar taste.  At Blaze, they ‚Ä¶More

name: Susie
text: Delicious pizza! I really enjoy pizza from Blaze bc you can incorporate chicken and/or all the veggies avail for a healthy pie! Crust is super thin so you're not filling up with all the dough. Choice of pizza sauces as well... marinara, spicy, and pesto. Employees always helpful and friendly. Very clean establishment.

name: Danielle Encinas
text: Build your own pizza... is my favorite. Staff is nice. Food seems very fresh!

name: Steven Raymer
text:
Great food, great service, great atmosphere.
Walking in shows off the clean open feel of the restaurant. Look to your left to find the ordering options - the basics being size of pizza, type of crust, and ‚Ä¶More

name: Neil Amstutz
text: The last time we were here they burned the bottom of the crust. This time, we asked for a BYO salad as part of our order. The first guy may not have heard us, so we mentioned it to the second person. They asked the first guy and then they ‚Ä¶More

name: Jafa 23
text: Great experience. The place was busy but the staff were still very efficient. Pizza was really tasty and the atmosphere was great. Very clean and professional

name: Mary McIntosh
text: Very good custom pizza place. A bit heavy on the hipster vibe, but the food is worth it!

name: Lynnette Wardell
text: So delicious! Wish we had one at home. Highly recommend them!

name: Amy Cannon
text: Great food. Great service. Definitely going to be our place for Friday family dinner! ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Schmidt
text: We just received the most laughably bad pizza I've ever seen. I almost never write negative reviews.....but the basil & mozzarella pizza that we just had delivered from this establishment has whole pieces of the pizza with NOTHING on them. ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Eddy
text: Super friendly staff and probly the best pizza in town. Cool vibes and good food

name: Jah Jah
text: First time went there -awesome pies. I'm from Brooklyn, NY where we are picky with the pies and for real they do a top notch pie. Really really thin crust- we kept it simple, meatballs, hubby got the spicy sauce -they top it with arugula ‚Ä¶More

name: Elizabeth Thomas
text: Fast, friendly service. I was there to pick up an order ...smells delicious in there!

name: jordanbowman26
text: The pizza is really good... However I can‚Äôt help but feel all four times, I‚Äôve been really rushed (even without customers behind me). The staff repeatedly asks ‚Äúanything else‚Äù over and over. I would give five stars if the staff were more friendly, welcoming and patient.

name: Dean Leyva
text: Great service and everyone went out of their way to ensure my pizza was prepared and cooked extra crispy. I just love how busy the young woman responsible for working the oven was still took the time to pull the pizza out of the oven and let me decide whether or not it was ready twice.

name: pyro lopez
text: Best affordable and awesome freshly-made Pizza in the area, Blaze team is always kind courteous and fast always love the spot when I feel like a pie!

name: Linda P
text: Great pizza that can be  personalized to anyone's  taste!

name: Paul Injeti
text: Great options for vegans and gluten free, but the wait was pretty long around dinner time and seemed to just get longer.

name: Tiffany Dudek
text: Pizza decent.. service is lacking for sure! No explanation of what to order where, and when we asked they rushed us through dispite it being NOT busy. Staff all standoff-ish. I would say rude. Staff corrected me when I called an item as it ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Birdnow
text: Really really really good pizza! And I thought the staff is over the top in friendliness.

name: robert robledo
text: Great vegan options

name: Stephanie Kelly
text: I didn't think the pizza here would be anything special, but they have a fresh, amazing flavor on a crispy thin crust.  I crave the pizza here now.  They also have this Mandarin orange lemonade that is absolutely luscious!  I only tried the restaurant because I had a coupon, but I will definitely be back with or without one!

name: Jake More
text: Love this place everyone is always so nice and welcoming

name: Jen Loewer
text: People there were awesome. It‚Äôs rare you find a place where the employees actually thank the customer for coming in. Also amazing pizza. Great price to pick what you want.

name: y. s
text: I hate pizza with a passion...  But i saw this place was open and was convinced I had to try it since my kids love pizza so much.. Today. I came in the customer service is great and as for the pizza this will be the ONLY pizza We will be ‚Ä¶More

name: Tonya Zuchowski
text: So so so so so soooooooo good. Love it. And I'm not even a fan of pizza. My Husband tried to get me to go here ever since they opened. I wish I would have listened. It was amazing.

name: james spies
text: Went there once didn't have that good of an experience second time I went through Cara the manager was there whole experience changed. But both times the pizza was amazing fresh, flavorful and huge variety of toppings. Definitely try one of the glazes at the end

name: Janelle Russell
text: The pizza is delicious and made fresh to order. All natural sodas, matcha water, and friendly and happy employees all make for a great atmosphere. Gluten-free crust option. This is our new favorite pizza place!!!

name: Brenda Loftin
text: Love this place.  The food is done to my picky kid's liking and eager to help.

name: Vicky Dolese
text: Loved the create your own pizza. The selections of toppings were vast and it's all you want not just 3 toppings like other pizza restaurants.

name: Janet Hendricks
text: Broadway/Wilmot- The best! Amazingly delicious and the staff are on their game. Great atmosphere, best üçï pizza!

name: Kim Davis
text: Best pizza available, anywhere! You get to have exactly what you want.

name: Corey
text: Decent pizza. Friendly staff, quick service, lots of selections. Like a chipotle but for pizza... Very trendy these days. Salad was smaller than expected. There are much better places for pizza in Tucson, but blaze is kitschy enough that we might go back if we want pizza in a hurry.

name: Morgan S
text: Best pizza place in town, and the prices are decent.

name: Leah Laster
text: It was ok. Nothing spectacular. Fire pizza is flavorful

name: F Del Mater
text: Friendly, fast service, good food.

name: cristina mungaray
text: Went for a school fundraiser it was great they even put flyers out so that anyone can participate

name: traveling carnival
text:
Such good food .

Now closedüò∞

name: Darth Jeffy
text: Kids love it, one of there favorite places. Extra benefit, it is fast!

name: Cecelia Fresh
text: Sweet online deal. 2 for $10 pepperoni.

name: STAN KOZ
text: UNBELIEVABLE..... Great pizza at a fantastic price!! We've been here two times and have been impressed both times. Can't wait for one to open by our house.

name: Sarah Roland
text: Great pizza with gluten free and vegan options. Clean restaurant, nice employees. Love this build your own pizza place.

name: Vincent D
text: Great pizza, but the service leaves a lot to be desired

name: Dvo Squid
text: Best pizza in town- handmade and fire-baked in front of you. Amazing artisan pizza without the crowds or prices you find downtown. Highly recommended.  Kid friendly, too!

name: Myzteke Delaloco
text: This is one of the best and fastest pizzas I ever had!! Fantastic job guys!

name: Damon Demadona
text: Amazing pizza friendly staff great place

name: Mike Oxbig1970
text: Pizza is awesome but lady helping me listen to what I ordered seemed preoccupied. I love the specialty sodas and that they have cane sugar.

name: Gary Dolese
text: Good Pizza, friendly helpful staff, best price for a "build your own".

name: karen lepoo
text: it's good but could be better.  cashier kid was a jerk... wait, that boy is always a jerk, now that i think about it. everyone else is helpful and cool.

name: Sara Runkee
text: Super delicious, quick and cheap. Also, less greasy than most traditional pizzas, which is a huge reason I love it so much!

name: Darcy Kurtzweg
text: Always awesome! Fast service and the Build Your Own is the way to go! Consistently the best pizza there is!

name: Dylan Strickland
text: It has good pizza don't get me wrong but compaired to other build your own pizza joints around like Mod the price was just too much for me.

name: Andrew Castro
text: Awesome that they sell beer and house made lemonades that are amazing! Plus the price is actually reasonable. Check them out for yourself.

name: Anthony Schiavone
text: Simple and amazing. Waaaaay better than MOD

name: Kit Rendon
text: Blaze Pizza is a great addition to the Tucson restaurant scene.  It has something for everybody and I recommend it for the whole family.  The service was fabulous and we loved the  pizza!!!

name: Rebekah Lopez
text: Its permanently closed.

name: uNdErThEsTaIrS
text: Always a fast lunch. Great staff. Great place to meet up.

name: Michael Trent Lowry
text: Delicious, made-to-order single person pizzas that are still big enough to share. Good fountain drink selections. Best of all it's affordably priced with convenient east-central location.

name: Jon Fischer
text: Amazing pizza, always cooked through unlike some of the same kinds of pizza places.  Fresh ingredients, they don't really have a variety of sauces for dipping like you find at some competitors.  Hard to park, lot is small and shared by two ‚Ä¶More

name: Juli-Ann Bowser
text: I went in today with my friend and was greeted by some of the most amazing people working. They made the environment so welcoming and fun. We came close to closing but they were so helpful with my friend whom has never been. I want to say ‚Ä¶More

name: Steven Crofts
text: Friend took me for first time - loved it. Pick toppings you want and so tasty. Taking my wife soon.

name: Stephanie O.
text: Amazing first class service... Dough nuts came out raw but the mistake was quickly corrected

name: Jeremy Bunkley
text: This place is the best! Delicious pizza with an awesome staff.

name: Joe Rifi
text: Pizza here is very similar to MOD pizza, they do have a great selection of toppings and cheeses for your pizza. I do like MOD pizza better, to me MODs toppings seem to be more flavorful. Definitely a great choice for build your own pizza type resturant. But give MOD a try too.

name: David K.
text: Excellent artisan type thin crust pizza.  Very fresh and tasty.   Build your own pizza for $ 8.25 (choose any toppings).  Think Subway or Chipotle type service.   11 inch pizza that is plenty for most people.  Total time from order to fast ‚Ä¶More

name: rose cannedy
text: The food here is always amazing! One of my favorite places for pizza! Andres and his team gave us amazing service and the store is always clean ‚ù§

name: Celina Rosales
text: Very great serviceüòÑThe food is amazing

name: Janet Rachel
text: Good pizza! The coking time is short. Yay! It is the time in line that is long! At this particular location the toppings were a little skimpy. We like that they have Mexican Coke!!

name: Rich How
text: First time here. 6/27 12:46pm. Great experience. Clean. Friendly and really good pizza. Thank you to the Blaze Team.

name: Kassy McBride
text: Fast delicious thin crust pizza with many options to personalize. Staff is friendly and restaurant is clean.

name: Robert Leasure
text: Awesome pizza!!!  Unlimited toppings And my favorite IPA, Dragoon.  Plus $5 Mondays.  I would give them 6 stars if I could!

name: Matthew Tequida
text: Best build your own pizza place in Tucson.

name: iiwolfvita
text: Great place for a family that all want different toppings (get several pizzas). Also, their pizza tastes great as leftovers.

name: Shelby Lee
text: All employees here are awesome and the food is great.

name: James David
text: Friendly service, clean store, quality of toppings and options great. Tasted very good. Job well done, I will for sure be a regular customer.

name: Marcela Sanders
text: I've visited Blaze Pizza for the second time and I really enjoyed my experience there. Their customer service is great and my pizza was delicious. If you haven't had the opportunity to go, you should!

name: Sir Benjamin Arthur IV
text: Great pizza and fast service. It's a lot like MOD pizza if youve ever been there, except theres only one size pizza so that makes choosing easier.

name: Luisa B
text: Fresh ingredients. They make your personalized pizza as you ordered it. The price is very reasonable for the quality of the food.

name: Rose Kress
text: Enjoyed the options! Cups and straws were vegetable based. Definitely going back.

name: Patrick Richardson
text: Single build your own it was amazingly quick and easy absolutely delicious 2

name: Stryder Staffa
text: Mmmm. So good. Never would have went here if it want free but I got a free pizza coupon in the mail. Now I'm hooked. Ever month I get a buy one, get one, deal from then and I go straight in. Upgrade to the thick crust. It's so good.

name: Thomas Gaumer
text: Easy parking.  You get to choose the ingredients  and volume and get the pizza  hot from the oven.  hat more is there

name: ForFyve Ziro
text: It's like the subway of pizza with a wood oven at the end. Price is reasonable with great quality. Loads of toppings, Perfect for lunch :)

name: Javier Jordan
text: This is the best pizza ever. good quality of topping, fast service and cheap. I recommend this place to everybody.

name: aleusha drake
text: Love the build your own pizza special!

name: Nate Taylor
text: Pretty delicious place- I love the build your own pizza places that have a singular price for loading up a pie with as many toppings and as much as you want. I didnt go nuts, but it certainly was no wimpy pizza either!

name: Rosemarie Spece
text: They are sooo nice here. Also the pizza is pretty good.

name: Tonnisha Bolian
text: Quick and yummy pizza every time

name: Marji LeBlond
text: Love being able to watch my own creation being made!

name: Elizabeth Jasso
text: Blaze Pizza has to be the best pizza I have had in years and the great thing about it is that no matter how you want your pizza it is all the same price. Blaze is a build you own pizza place it truly is a one of a kind place with fast friendly service. You can't go wrong dining at Blaze Pizza.

name: River Graff
text: Amazing food--many options for health restrictions like vegan cheese and gluten-free crust, and it all tastes amazing (with vegan cheese, that's hard to do).  Staff is friendly, food cooks fast and well done, the restaurant is always clean.  Hands down best pizza I've had in years.

name: Mark Gorton
text: Good food at a good price.  Quick service.

name: Hector Miranda
text: Mix garlic and original sauce for a new taste in pizza

name: Shannon MacMacKen
text: Good food. Love that they have vegan cheese! Need basic conveniences like napkins on the tables.

name: Ninie T

nice place, service and reasonable price.
